I guess only time will tell but I believe we already see how internet eroded state power over the last decade (free flow of information, etc..)

I hope internet and crypto will slowly and peacefully make nation state irrelevant.
He would say that, being literally one "Mc" away from the "Give me liberty, or give me death!" guy

>govts could be hooked into the bitcoin network to unleash a 51% attack

Absolutely a possibility, chances are good that they've already made arrangements with the largest mining pools, or simply built their own. I have little doubt that Coingeek has a massive US government SHA256 mining farm. With access to basically unlimited fiat, they can make it rain whenever they like.

Then again, the Chinese government also has their mining farms... and Russia probably too.
